about_the_game:
For Graygrowl!

Battle Nibbs is here! Clad in fiercesome armor, and with freshly-brushed fur, she pounces onto the battlefield with the most powerful Zurian in the Universe! The hunt for Skreeletor is on!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Nibbs in Awesomenauts. You need to have Nibbs available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game. This skin contains a fully customized voice set!
detailed_description:
For Graygrowl!

Battle Nibbs is here! Clad in fiercesome armor, and with freshly-brushed fur, she pounces onto the battlefield with the most powerful Zurian in the Universe! The hunt for Skreeletor is on!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Nibbs in Awesomenauts. You need to have Nibbs available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game. This skin contains a fully customized voice set!
legal_notice: © 2012-2013 Ronimo Games. Ronimo Games and Awesomenauts are trademarks or registered trademarks of Ronimo Games.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection
